info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:28PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BROWN COUNTY... At 828 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Houghton, or 20 miles southeast of Ellendale, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Brown County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
